Example CNAqc dataset.

Source: R/data.R
example_dataset_CNAqc.Rd

Example CNAqc dataset.

data(example_dataset_CNAqc)

Format

A list of snvs, cna and purity value that can be used to run CNAqc analyses.

References

??

Examples

data(example_dataset_CNAqc)
example_dataset_CNAqc
#> $snvs
#> # A tibble: 13,141 x 13
#>    chr     from     to ref   alt   FILTER    DP    NV    VAF ANNOVAR_FUNCTION

#>  6 chr1  2.77e6 2.77e6 C     T     PASS     203   130 0.640  intergenic      
#>  7 chr1  2.94e6 2.94e6 C     T     PASS     228   132 0.579  intergenic      
#>  8 chr1  2.98e6 2.98e6 C     T     PASS     196    85 0.434  ncRNA_exonic    
#>  9 chr1  3.39e6 3.39e6 T     G     PASS     124     6 0.0484 intronic
